snippet.title: Yume No Office - Wishlist On Steam and itch.io
snippet.description:
Wishlist On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2978070/

Play the demo and add to your colection in itch.io: https://outsidercomet.itch.io/yumekawaii

Hello, this is Tsukasa speaking, and welcome to your new job. Here, we don't work from an office because your home is the office.

In this adventure, you are Kuta, a boy who was fired and luckily helped by his childhood friend Kaori. We are normal people, but when it comes to our performance bonuses, we fight using a very ancient method... The... Umm... Pong?...

Game Features:

- In-Game Calendar: Time progresses according to an in-game calendar.


- Random Mood System: Characters can have different moods that affect interactions.


- Total of 25 Events: There are 5 events available for each of the 5 protagonists, offering a variety of situations and moments! - Only in chapter 1


- Special Calendar Events: Includes celebrations like Valentine's Day and White Day!


- Pong Minigame: This is where women become women, or rather, this place has become a gambling spot thanks to Pong.


- Affinity System: Helps unlock specific events by developing closer relationships with the characters.



The chapters will be released gradually. People who purchase the game will have access to all updates for free.

The Team

Direction by: K-Bayashi, Mechanical Lobster, Spring, RyumiVT

Music by: RubbiYT,  PHILIP FERNGREEN

Design and Sprites by: Pimienta Kast

Backgrounds and UI by: K.M

Scriptwriter by: Mechanical Lobster, Spring
